title: WTS/WTT- Sleepy Bill Burns  PRINTER'S SCRAP

posts.post_title: WTS/WTT- Sleepy Bill Burns  PRINTER'S SCRAP
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone!!


I have for sale or trade a sweet BILL BURNS printer's scrap....

                                    ****$550.00****

or Trade   

or Cash and Trade of equal value.


the skinny:


A beautiful,  unique(1 of a kind)  and very cool Black Sox player !!!

DON'T LET THIS ONE GO;)  

GREAT STARTER SCRAP on a budget:);)

1)Card is in absolute EX condition:eek:  SGC graded "AUTH" (as you want for a printer's scrap, BECAUSE  none will ever get a numerical grade since they were ALL hand cut from a scrapped sheet!!!)

2)Card has HUGE "WACKY" hand cut borders (as you want with any printer's scrap).....the larger than standard borders hand cut is what you want on a printers scrap, helps prove this is  scrap, not crap status:D...

3)Card has a very cool upside down player blue ghost image on the front!!(I can't figure out the player, you might be able to correlate the print group, looks like the out line of the lower torso should be able to be match it up....some ghost image front scraps go for multi K!!! 

4)  Card has a WST of burns in yellow on back....:cool:


Black Sox Player
SGC graded properly as "AUTH" 
almost EX condition for scrap 
wacky ass big borders 
upside down blue ghost image on front
Wet sheet transfer of Bill Burns on back


****prefer email       [url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]

Thanks 


Peace

Johnny
open to trades also! don't let this one pass you by:D
His eyes are wide open, he's not sleepy in this pic !!
